name: MWMT
description:
MWMT Is a very short top down shooter made for the Brackey's 2021 game jam. In MWMT you must Build up your mech tower by collecting various weapons that are lying around and then blow stuff up. 

Controls: 

WASD to move, scroll to zoom in/ out, click to shoot, drive over weapons to pick them up, F to heal (maximum of 4 times).
